ValidationRule.description: Completed fulfilment requires a completed date
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "Complete")
&&
ISBLANK( Date_Fulfilment_Complete__c ) && NOT(ISPICKVAL( Checklist_Type__c , "Rebalance")) && NOT(ISPICKVAL( Checklist_Type__c , "Portfolio switch"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please add an accurate date that the fulfilment was completed
